email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for a laycan of 15-20 October. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight rate is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider $49.50 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $49.50 is a bit tight. How about we meet in the middle at $50.00 per metric ton? The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $50.00 per metric ton is acceptable, provided the laycan remains firm at 15-20 October. Can we also agree on a demurrage rate of $18,000 per day? Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Final Offer
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’m glad we’re close to an agreement. I can confirm the laycan of 15-20 October and a demurrage rate of $18,000 per day. The freight rate will be $50.00 per metric ton. I’ll prepare the charter party agreement and send it over for your review. Let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment - Final Offer
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good on my end. Please proceed with the charter party agreement, and I’ll review it as soon as it’s ready. Thanks for your help in finalizing this deal. Cheers, John.
